scrape_metadata.notes: The Wall Art collection exists in Shopify with a reported count of 5 products, but all API endpoints return an empty products array. This indicates the products in this collection are either: (1) unpublished/draft status, (2) sold out and configured to hide when unavailable, (3) geographically restricted, or (4) the collection metadata is stale. The collection page at https://rootsonrise.com/collections/wall-art displays '0 products' and 'No products found' message.
